ComicInfo.Summary:
Robyn's supernatural PI business is back up and running but clients aren't exactly beating down her door. She decides to take matters into her own hands and earn some reward money by solving a local missing person's case. But she quickly finds out that this is anything but you're typical disappearance and that landing this reward may cost Robyn her life.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Richard Ortiz & Ivan Nunes | 1 | | B | Cover B | Alfredo Reyes & Kyle Ritter | 3 | | C | Cover C | Jose Luis & Adriano Augusto | 4 | | D | Cover D | David Lorenzo Riveiro & Jorge Meguro | 5 | | E | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Cosplay Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Eric Basaldua & Nei Ruffino | 2 | | F | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Cosplay Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Eric Basaldua & Nei Ruffino | Missing |
Note: The digital edition (7/13/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
